DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to identify clinical symptoms and outcomes, as well as response to anti-viral treatment in children living in Geneva, with influenza A/ H1N1 infection during the current pandemic.
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiology and Clinical Presentation of H1N1 Infection in Children in Geneva
DOC.criteria: suspicion of H1N1 infection Not available for a 30 days followup
